participant_1.name: Jake
participant_1.personality: Easygoing and hardworking, enjoys music and outdoor activities.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to listen to rock music while working. i've three arabian horses.

participant_2.name: Liam
participant_2.personality: Reflective and cautious, striving for recovery and stability.
participant_2.background: i now live in the city. i'm a recovering alcoholic. i take many medications and some of them make me see things. i grew up on a farm.

content.text: hello, how are you today? i am good.
